s.text: We must attack atherosclerosis at the very onset, not wait until it is Òhigh risk.Ó
It is time to end the mindset that thinks of atherosclerosis as an inevitable function of aging.
Screening tests should be easy, affordable, widely available, and predictive.
Carotid ultrasound is an easy, safe, noninvasive method for detecting early, focal plaques and early thickening of the inner lining of the artery [6].
Using high-sensitivity carotid ultrasound as a primary screening tool would add modest cost, but that would be more than offset by sharply reducing the enormous worldwide toll of atherosclerosis.
